text: Hi guys – currently using this markup to calculate related posts. However, some blog posts have several topics, and it is trying to pull posts that only match all of the topics, versus just one out of however many there is. Is there any way to change the HuBL to only look for posts containing atleast one related post instead of all? Thanks.

<@U4RP6AGV9> commented on <@U4RP6AGV9>’s file <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U4RP6AGV9/F9KG6TS22/try_this.pl|https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U4RP6AGV9/F9KG6TS22/try_this.pl>: <@U795QFHDE> This may work... haven't tried it
